name: GPU-particles-web
description: GPU particle system with WebGL2 and WebGPU ray tracing

scripts.build:wasm: cd physics && wasm-pack build crates/xpbd-wasm --target web --out-dir ../../../wasm/pkg
scripts.build:wasm:debug: cd physics && wasm-pack build crates/xpbd-wasm --target web --dev --out-dir ../../../wasm/pkg
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
